content: > this little pud by designer brigitte read contains something better than a sixpence it s a basket for your crochet notions you could also use the basket as an alternative to a traditional stocking filling it with little gifts and hanging it at the foot of a bed or you could fill it with wrapped chocolates as a more seasonal alternative to handing around a tin by using lighter weight yarn and a smaller hook you could make this pud any size even small enough for a christmas tree decoration aran-weight yarn 75g of brown 25g each of white dark green and dark red 3 5mm crochet hook 8 x 1⁄4in 20cm x 12mm green velvet ribbon five buttons
